languages.text: "Одни ненавидят нас и боятся, называют убийцами и жнецами. Иные величают танцорами Смерти, что души усопших проводят в мир после жизни. И те и другие правы. И те и другие ошибаются. Мы — слуги {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Неумирающего Императора{/g}. Когда Он шепчет, что душе праведника или мученика пора в его благословенные длани — мы забираем ее. Когда Он шепчет, что нечестивцам пора познать гнев его — мы пожинаем. Так мы поддерживаем порядок на корабле. Незримые, ведомые волей Смерти".

"Some loathe and fear us, they call us murderers and reapers. Others call us dancers of death who send the souls of the dead on their way. Both are right. Both are wrong. We are servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying Emperor{/g}. When He whispers that the time has come for a righteous martyr's soul to be laid in His blessed hands, we come to claim it. When He whispers that the wicked must know of His wrath, we come to reap. This is how we maintain order on the ship, unseen and guided by death's will."
languages.original_text: "Одни ненавидят нас и боятся, называют убийцами и жнецами. Иные величают танцорами Смерти, что души усопших проводят в мир после жизни. И те и другие правы. И те и другие ошибаются. Мы — слуги {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Неумирающего Императора{/g}. Когда Он шепчет, что душе праведника или мученика пора в его благословенные длани — мы забираем ее. When He whispers that the wicked must know of His wrath, we come to reap. This is how we maintain order on the ship, unseen and guided by death's will."

languages.text: «Algunos nos temen y nos desprecian, tachándonos de asesinos y carniceros. Otros nos ven como bailarines de la muerte que envían las almas de los difuntos al otro lado. Ambas cosas son ciertas. Ambas se equivocan. Somos siervos del {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperador Inmortal{/g}. Cuando Él susurra que ha llegado la hora de que un alma virtuosa y mártir se reúna con Él, nosotros acudimos en su busca. Cuando Él susurra que los pecadores deben sufrir Su cólera, nosotros somos Su instrumento. Así mantenemos el orden en la nave: una mano invisible guiada por la voluntad de la muerte».
languages.original_text: "Some loathe and fear us, they call us murderers and reapers. Others call us dancers of death who send the souls of the dead on their way. Both are right. Both are wrong. We are servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying Emperor{/g}. When He whispers that the time has come for a righteous martyr's soul to be laid in His blessed hands, we come to claim it. When He whispers that the wicked must know of His wrath, we come to reap. This is how we maintain order on the ship, unseen and guided by death's will."

Ambas cosas son ciertas. Ambas se equivocan. Somos siervos del {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperador Inmortal{/g}. Cuando Él susurra que ha llegado la hora de que un alma virtuosa y mártir se reúna con Él, nosotros acudimos en su busca. Cuando Él susurra que los pecadores deben sufrir Su cólera, nosotros somos Su instrumento. Así mantenemos el orden en la nave: una mano invisible guiada por la voluntad de la muerte».

languages.text: 「ある者は私たちを嫌悪し、恐れ、殺人者だと、死神だと呼ぶわ。他には死者の魂を送り出す死の踊り子と呼ぶ者もいる。どちらも正しくて、どちらも間違っている。私たちは{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不死の皇帝{/g}に仕える従者。正義の殉教者の魂が、その祝福の御手の中で休む時が来たと主が囁く時、私たちは迎えに行く。主が、悪人が主の怒りを知るべきだと囁く時、私たちは刈り取りに行く。こうして私たちは、見られることなく、死の意思に導かれ、船上の秩序を保っているの」
languages.original_text: "Some loathe and fear us, they call us murderers and reapers. Others call us dancers of death who send the souls of the dead on their way. Both are right. Both are wrong. We are servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying Emperor{/g}. When He whispers that the time has come for a righteous martyr's soul to be laid in His blessed hands, we come to claim it. When He whispers that the wicked must know of His wrath, we come to reap. This is how we maintain order on the ship, unseen and guided by death's will."

traits.locale_text: 「ある者は私たちを嫌悪し、恐れ、殺人者だと、死神だと呼ぶわ。他には死者の魂を送り出す死の踊り子と呼ぶ者もいる。どちらも正しくて、どちらも間違っている。私たちは{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不死の皇帝{/g}に仕える従者。正義の殉教者の魂が、その祝福の御手の中で休む時が来たと主が囁く時、私たちは迎えに行く。主が、悪人が主の怒りを知るべきだと囁く時、私たちは刈り取りに行く。こうして私たちは、見られることなく、死の意思に導かれ、船上の秩序を保っているの」

languages.text: “有的人厌恶我们，惧怕我们，称我们为杀人犯、收割者。还有人称我们为死亡的舞者，将死者的灵魂送到彼岸。两者的说法都没错，也都是错的。我们是{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不死神皇{/g}的仆人，每当祂通过低语告知我们，正义的殉道者渴望将灵魂交付到祂的祝福之手时，我们就会前来收取灵魂。而当祂低声诉说邪恶之人必须承受祂的怒火时，我们就会收割该死之人。这就是我们维持船上秩序的方式。我们是看不见的利刃，受死亡意志的指引。”
languages.original_text: "Some loathe and fear us, they call us murderers and reapers. Others call us dancers of death who send the souls of the dead on their way. Both are right. Both are wrong. We are servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying Emperor{/g}. When He whispers that the time has come for a righteous martyr's soul to be laid in His blessed hands, we come to claim it. When He whispers that the wicked must know of His wrath, we come to reap. This is how we maintain order on the ship, unseen and guided by death's will."

traits.locale_text: “有的人厌恶我们，惧怕我们，称我们为杀人犯、收割者。还有人称我们为死亡的舞者，将死者的灵魂送到彼岸。两者的说法都没错，也都是错的。我们是{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不死神皇{/g}的仆人，每当祂通过低语告知我们，正义的殉道者渴望将灵魂交付到祂的祝福之手时，我们就会前来收取灵魂。而当祂低声诉说邪恶之人必须承受祂的怒火时，我们就会收割该死之人。这就是我们维持船上秩序的方式。我们是看不见的利刃，受死亡意志的指引。”

languages.text: "Manche verabscheuen und fürchten uns, sie nennen uns Mörder und Schnitter. Andere nennen uns Tänzer des Todes, die die Seelen der Toten auf ihrem Weg begleiten. Beide haben recht. Beide irren sich. Wir sind Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Todlosen Imperators{/g}. Wenn Er flüstert, dass die Zeit gekommen ist, die Seele eines rechtschaffenen Märtyrers in Seine gesegneten Hände zu legen, kommen und holen wir sie. Wenn Er flüstert, dass die Bösen von Seinem Zorn erfahren müssen, kommen wir und ernten. So bewahren wir Ordnung auf dem Schiff, ungesehen und geleitet vom Willen des Todes."
languages.original_text: "Some loathe and fear us, they call us murderers and reapers. Others call us dancers of death who send the souls of the dead on their way. Both are right. Both are wrong. We are servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying Emperor{/g}. When He whispers that the time has come for a righteous martyr's soul to be laid in His blessed hands, we come to claim it. When He whispers that the wicked must know of His wrath, we come to reap. This is how we maintain order on the ship, unseen and guided by death's will."

Wenn Er flüstert, dass die Bösen von Seinem Zorn erfahren müssen, kommen wir und ernten. So bewahren wir Ordnung auf dem Schiff, ungesehen und geleitet vom Willen des Todes."

languages.text: « Certains nous haïssent et nous craignent, ils nous traitent d'assassins sanguinaires. D'autres voient en nous des danseurs de la mort chargés d'expédier les âmes des défunts de l'autre côté. Tous ont à la fois tort et raison. Nous sommes les serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Empereur Immortel{/g}. Quand Il murmure que l'heure est venue pour un martyre de rejoindre Ses bras sacrés, nous nous chargeons de le Lui envoyer. Quand Il murmure que les mécréants doivent subir Sa colère, nous nous chargeons de les éliminer. C'est ainsi que nous maintenons l'ordre à bord du vaisseau, invisibles et guidés par la volonté de la mort. »
languages.original_text: "Some loathe and fear us, they call us murderers and reapers. Others call us dancers of death who send the souls of the dead on their way. Both are right. Both are wrong. We are servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying Emperor{/g}. When He whispers that the time has come for a righteous martyr's soul to be laid in His blessed hands, we come to claim it. When He whispers that the wicked must know of His wrath, we come to reap. This is how we maintain order on the ship, unseen and guided by death's will."

languages.text: "Kimisi bizden nefret edip korkar. Bize katil ve cani diyorlar. Başkalarıysa bize ölülerin ruhlarına yol gösteren ölüm cambazları der. İki taraf da haklı. İki taraf da haksız. Bizler, {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Ölmeyen İmparator'un{/g} hizmetkârlarıyız. O bize erdemli bir şehidin ruhunun artık O'na kavuşması gerektiğini fısıldadığında gelir, şehidi rahmetine kavuştururuz. O bize zalimlere O'nun hiddetini yaşatmamız gerektiğini fısıldadığında gelir, zalimin canını alırız. Bu gemide düzen, gözle görülmeden ve ölümün rehberliğinde sürdürülür."
languages.original_text: "Some loathe and fear us, they call us murderers and reapers. Others call us dancers of death who send the souls of the dead on their way. Both are right. Both are wrong. We are servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying Emperor{/g}. When He whispers that the time has come for a righteous martyr's soul to be laid in His blessed hands, we come to claim it. When He whispers that the wicked must know of His wrath, we come to reap. This is how we maintain order on the ship, unseen and guided by death's will."
